title: White as Snow: A Christmas Story
description: ' White As Snow is a novel for all ages about the power of miracles and the bonds of trust...transformational and heartwarming.' -Midwest Book ReviewCOLORADO TERRITORY 1864. Charlie is all alone on the ranch that sits between the empty prairie and the Rocky Mountains. As the orphaned boy cares for his dying grandpa and tries to figure out how to survive the approaching winter, he keeps remembering the old man's 'Failure's not an option, son.' As the first storm of the season hits, a mysterious mountain man shows up at the isolated ranch and good things start to happen. But to get free of his one gnawing secret, Charlie must learn to trust the giant stranger. On Christmas day he learns that trusting means he'll never have to be alone again.
author: Donna Westover Gallup
